### Oicon_COM

``` js
import { Oicon } from 'vux'
```

<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default  |  version | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key" style="white-space:nowrap;">type</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | <span style="font-size:12px;white-space:nowrap;"></span> | icon name, optional values are shown in demo |
| <span class="prop-key" style="white-space:nowrap;">is-msg</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | <span style="font-size:12px;white-space:nowrap;"></span> | if used as msg icon. Icon's font-size will be bigger(93px) than default |
